rodash
  • Modules
    • rodash

Module: rodash

Members

andx

Test all argument as boolean and return the result. Primary goal is to allow mult-line and statements.

Example
if _.andx([
  test1
  test2 = invalid
  test3 = 6])
  print "true"
else
  print "false"
end if

clone

cloneDeep

cond

Conditionally return something based on boolean argument.

Native equivalent:

  if true
    x = 1
  else
    x = 2
  end if
Example
x = _.cond(true, 1, 2)

createRequest

Create a new request object - inspired by node-fetch

difference

empty

Test for a string, array, or object to be invalid, length, or count of zero.

equal

get

Resolve a nested 'dot' notation path safely. This is primarily allow things like "myValue = a.b.c.d.e.f" to run without crashing the VM when an intermediate value is invalid.

getManifest

Read and parse the manifest file manually in order to retrieve all key/value pairs. Manifest is always at pkg:/manifest, but can be overridden for testing

indexOf

intersection

map

orx

Test each argument as boolean and return the result. Primary goal is to allow mult-line or statements.

Example
if _.orx([
   test1
   test2 = invalid
   test3 = 6]) and test4 <> invalid
   print "true"
 else
   print "false"
end if

regRead

Read and deserialize to a native type

regReadAll

regReadAll

By default this overwrites any existing data, but will not remove any sections or keys

regWrite

set

uriEncodeParams

Encode an associative array to a urlencoded query string or post body

uriParse

Encode an associative array to a urlencoded query string or post body
